description.value:
Requirements The ally hasn't acted in the current combat.

Trigger An ally's turn begins.

You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Quickened]{Quickened} this turn and can spend the extra action to Stride, Strike, Demoralize, Feint, or Perform.
